info.name: DevFlow API
info.description: Complete API collection for DevFlow - GitHub Project Dashboard

request.description: Initiates GitHub OAuth flow and returns redirect URL
Handles GitHub OAuth callback and returns JWT token
Get new JWT token using refresh token
Get all repositories added by user
Add a new GitHub repository to dashboard
Get detailed information about a specific repository
Manually sync repository issues from GitHub
Configure GitHub webhook for real-time updates
Get complete details of a single issue

body.raw:
{
  "repositoryId": "ckl987654321",
  "title": "Fix login bug",
  "body": "Users cannot login with email containing +",
  "labels": ["bug", "priority-high"],
  "assignees": ["johndoe"],
  "milestone": "v1.0",
  "priority": "P0",
  "estimatedTime": 60
}

request.description: Create new issue on GitHub and store locally
Update issue on GitHub and locally
Perform bulk operations on multiple issues
Assign or unassign users to issue
Add or remove labels from issue
Get all comments for an issue
Get issues opened vs closed over time
Receives events from GitHub (called by GitHub, not users)
